channel.title: Hotmail - Cant unblock
channel.description:
No, I do not mean unblocking a user from messaging me. My AOL and Hotmail emails were both hacked shortly after I arrived at work today. To stop whoever from sending out any more spam emails they blocked my account from the messenger and able to send out emails. I can click "verify my account", but I have one [b]major[/b] issue here. My carrier is not supported under there. I have Cellular South for my cell phone, as well as a Google Voice number for when I want to freak people out a bit. I have tried both of these under all of the options and neither receive the SMS verification code.
Is there another way that I am just not seeing to be able to verify my account? I have an alternate email setup. I know that it is working there because it asks me to verify it with an email that was sent there to any change to my profile.

item.title: Hotmail - Cant unblock
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

ytuio9:

I don’t get it you can’t do it from a computer?

Nope, the only option it gives me is to send an SMS text to my mobile phone.

T4_:

get a new email

Problem is, the school I am planning to attend has that email on record. It is very difficult getting the counselor on the phone (have been trying since it got blocked), so the issue is, this email has become rather important lol.

Read full topic
